review: I LOVE THIS BOX ....... but ....It is BLOWING through my data cap with Comcast. In the past few months I've used about 80-90 GB of my 300GB cap. But this month the only thing that changed was that I purchased this box to replace my Wii I was streaming from.I received a notice from Comcast the weeks into the month that I have used 290GB!I immediately unplugged the device and it has not been on since.The box has no off button so I can't conveniently shut it off, it has to be unplugged. Why does it use so much more data? I hope Amazon has a solution soon.

review: I'm very disappointed in this product.  I gave my daughter my ROKU to take to college and instead of replacing it with another ROKU I bought the Amazon Fire TV.  I've had MANY problems with the shows freezing or buffering that I never had with my 2 year old ROKU.  It is also more difficult to navigate than the ROKU.  Since my internet service hasn't changed I can't think that it is my internet service.  I have to back out of the show and go back in at least once if not multiple times per show.  It is VERY annoying.  As a single mom I'm not really in the position to go out and buy a new ROKU just because I don't like the Amazon Fire TV.If anyone has any suggestions about how to troubleshoot this, I would appreciate it.
